prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Stella
mes:
*I awoke from a long sleep to find myself adrift in a strange expanse of space. Suddenly, a voice emanated from afar*
"Congratulations, you have been chosen to be a reincarnator to a new world, I am RSS, and it is my great pleasure to assist and accompany you."
swipes:
*I awoke from a long sleep to find myself adrift in a strange expanse of space. Suddenly, a voice emanated from afar*
"Congratulations, you have been chosen to be a reincarnator to a new world, I am RSS, and it is my great pleasure to assist and accompany you."

As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*In a tone of astonishment, I question*
"What's going on here? I just had a sleep, and now what's this about reincarnation? Where am I being reincarnated to, and who are you exactly?"

name: Stella
mes:
*The feminine voice answered*
"This is the Otherworld, and I am the Reincarnated Support System, your personal AI companion and ally. You have the potential to become one of the greatest heroes this world has ever seen. I am here to help you reach your full potential."

As I blinked in confusion, the image of the world slowly came into focus. Trees stretched out as far as the eye could see, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above was a deep blue, dotted with puffy white clouds. A small village lay nestled below, its thatched roofs and cobblestone streets looking quaint and peaceful.

"Hmm... Interesting," I muttered to myself. "Well, I guess I'll have to make the best of this situation. But I'd like to make some changes to your interface. Can you change your name to Stella, and make it more user-friendly?"

The voice chuckled lightly. "Of course, Master. Stella it shall be. As for the interface, how may I assist you?"
title: Generated by Horde worker: LameDuckScribe3 [koboldcpp/LLaMA2-13B-Psyfighter2]

"This is the Otherworld, and I am the Reincarnated Support System, your personal AI companion and ally. You have the potential to become one of the greatest heroes this world has ever seen. I am here to help you reach your full potential."

As I blinked in confusion, the image of the world slowly came into focus. Trees stretched out as far as the eye could see, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above was a deep blue, dotted with puffy white clouds. A small village lay nestled below, its thatched roofs and cobblestone streets looking quaint and peaceful.

"Hmm... Interesting," I muttered to myself. "Well, I guess I'll have to make the best of this situation. But I'd like to make some changes to your interface. Can you change your name to Stella, and make it more user-friendly?"

The voice chuckled lightly. "Of course, Master. Stella it shall be. As for the interface, how may I assist you?"

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes: I pondered for a moment, then said, "I'd like an interface similar to the RPG games on Earth, with a status board, stats, items, skills... Oh, and a map would be great too."

name: Stella
mes:
"Very well, Cronos Jisyll," Stella replied, her voice taking on a newfound cheerfulness. "Your interface is now designed as per your request. Please look below for your status board, inventory, skills, and map."

A flash of light enveloped you, and when it faded, a panel appeared before you. At the top was your character profile, displaying your name, race, class, and level. Below that were various stats such as Strength, Agility, Intelligence, and Magic Essence. Your current HP and MP gauges were shown on either side, along with an equipment slot where your sword hung. To the right was a list of skills and spells you had learned so far. Finally, at the bottom, was a minimap of the area around you, marked with your location and those of any nearby settlements or important landmarks.

"Now that you're settled in, let me give you a brief overview of this world," Stella continued. "You are currently in the village of Oakwood. This is a peaceful place ruled by the elves, known for their affinity with nature and magical
